message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it would greatly benefit your operations and enhance your efficiency. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I am extending this exclusive offer to you for $13,500. This price is inclusive of all features and services, and I am confident it represents an excellent investment for you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $13,500 is unfortunately a bit outside of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for it. This is the highest I can go at this time, considering my other options.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I am willing to negotiate further. For your convenience, I am now offering the product at $13,000. This still includes all the features and services you were interested in, and I hope this revised price aligns better with your current budget.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm confident that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.  Let's meet in the middle at $12,750. This would be a good compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I've reviewed our conversation and am willing to consider your latest proposal. For the sake of closing the deal, I propose a price of $12,900 for the product. This price still includes all the features and services you're interested in, and I believe it strikes a fair balance between our interests.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of your product, $12,900 is still a bit too high for me. Given your previous concessions, I believe $12,750 is a fair price, and it's the best I can offer. This would be a good compromise for both of us and will allow us to close the deal.

Considering our past negotiations, I am prepared to offer the product at $12,850. This price reflects a reasonable compromise while still allowing you to benefit fully from the features and services included. I believe this is a fair price that respects both our interests.
